Chapter 2 Probability 2.1 Introduction 2.2 Probability and Inference

Chapter 2 Probability 2.1 Introduction 2.2 Probability and Inference library(tidyverse) library(ggvis) library(htmlwidgets) library(threejs) library(dygraphs) library(htmlwidgets) library(threejs) z <- seq(-10, 10, 0.01) x <- cos(z) y <- sin(z) scatterplot3js(x,y,z, color=rainbow(length(z))) dygraph(discoveries, main = "Important Discoveries") %>% dyRoller(rollPeriod = 5)

Chapter 4 Continuous Distributions 4.1 Exponential Distributions library(tidyverse) expo_frame <- data_frame(x = seq(from = 0, to = 5, by =0.1)) expo_frame %>% mutate("lambda = 1" = dexp(x, rate = 1)) %>% mutate("lambda = 2" = dexp(x, rate = 1 / 2)) %>% mutate("lambda = 3" = dexp(x, rate = 1 / 3)) %>% gather(key = lambda, value = density, -x) %>% ggplot(aes(x = x, y = density, col = lambda)) + geom_line() + ggtitle("Exponential Density Functions")
